data.name: Summer~Life in the Countryside~ +Outing
data.detailed_description:
This is a DLC for "Summer~Life in the Countryside~".

☆ Additional elements
・Outdoor map is added.
・Fast travel is added.
・Outing events "Camping", "Swimming", and "Summer Festival" are added.
・One ending is added.

This is a simulation game in which you spend time with your childhood friend in the countryside.
Spend a special summer with her in the countryside.

data.short_description: This is a DLC for "Summer~Life in the Countryside~". ☆ Additional elements ・Outdoor map is added. ・Fast travel is added. ・Outing events "Camping", "Swimming", and "Summer Festival" are added. ・One ending is added.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
